PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-09002014-07-31,  ,  TBS,  , 
ActPublic Service Superannuation Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule I to the Public Service Superannuation Act
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE I TO THE PUBLIC SERVICE SUPERANNUATION ACT in order to (1) ensure continued participation in the public service pension plan for employees who are reorganized from Atomic Energy of Canada Limited into Canadian Nuclear Laboratories Ltd. (CNLL), its wholly-owned subsidiary; and (2) ensure that new employees hired by CNLL while it is a Crown corporation are eligible to participate in the public service pension plan.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0188 Publication Date: 2014-08-13
AttachmentsAttachment
